name: Keplar-22B
description:
In this demo for Keplar 22-B you will play as a person all alone of a sub looking for signs of life and seeing if its safe for earth inhabitants.

In this demo there is core mechanics like highscore system, radar sub system, repair system, death and random map generation

Each level you can collect rocks for scrap(can be used to repair), as you try to find a little blue capsule which will represent the mini base you stop at to reset the day, make sure to be careful for running into blocks that will invoke damage to your ship!

This game is very in development and there are a lot of aspects that are not blatantly explained in game so just know in advanced, but if you have any questions about its development, general stuff about the game, or advice / suggestions please feel free to msg me at fridays18#4002 on discord!
